content: Make use of your spells to keep the foe off-balance and to get away from their explosive attacks, and once they've been defeated, jump and perform a heavy attack to smash the glowing pot on the small wooden platform to gain an Awaken Wine Worm!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road'.
The content is as follows:
Make use of your spells to keep the foe off-balance and to get away from their explosive attacks, and once they've been defeated, jump and perform a heavy attack to smash the glowing pot on the small wooden platform to gain an Awaken Wine Worm!
